name: Watch Your Steps
tagline: The Pedometer Game for Health App
body:
### Watch your Steps
Watch Your Steps is a simple game based on the use of a pedometer on your mobile device. The pedometer runs in the background and awards you points for every step you take. These points can be used in a game that's a cross between an old-school RPG and an interactive narrative. Each steps impacts your in-game character - their stats, their adventures, and their appearance. The game makes walking fun and simple, and encourages you to increase your daily exercise.

### Games for Health

### Health Targets
_This section refers to excerpts from the [CDC's Winnable Battles Publications](http://www.cdc.gov/WinnableBattles/). The app addresses the issues of [Nutrition, Physical Activity, and Obesity](http://www.cdc.gov/winnablebattles/obesity/index.html)._

This app aims to address the knowledge, perceptions, and attitudes towards regular exercise as maintained by the general public. Watch Your Steps is a rewarding game that provides motivation for consistent, daily exercise, and and pushes the user to achieve age-, weight-, and gender- appropriate goals. It later iterations of the game, the app will also provide timely feedback for the user, to increase motivation and awareness of various health issues.

### Resources
Source code is taken from @bagilevi's opensource [Android Pedometer](https://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the app? Feel free to check out the documentation on the app's GitHub page and submit an issue. For suggestions or personal inquiries, feel free to email me at courtneybortle@gmail.com.
